name: WP Nightly – Dark Mode for WordPress
author: WPPAW

sections.description:
WP Nightly

WP Nightly is a plugin that turns the website dark at night. It also gives your website a new look and feel that may be appealing to many users.

WP Nightly works across all browsers perfectly, so no worry which browser your customers are using.

Features:
– Toggle Switch
– OS Aware
– 3 Button Styles
– 3 Color Palettes
sections.installation: Install the WP Nightly either via the WordPress plugin directory or by uploading the files to your server at wp-content/plugins.
sections.faq:
Can I use the WP Nightly on client websites?

Yes! You can certainly use the WP Nightly on yours as well as your clientâ€™s websites.
